name: Scallywags (itch) (playmakersdevteam)
description:
Play with up to 4 players locally through keyboard or controller.

Acquire all the main treasures indicated in each map to pass the level and pickup smaller treasures to improve your score. It won't be that easy though as enemies both on land and in the sea (and maybe at your ship) stand in your way. 

Good Larrrk

CONTROLS

  • Movement: WASD / Left Analogue Stick
  • Jump: Space / Controller (A)
  • Pickup/Drop Object: J / Controller (Y)
  • Throw Object: Hold J / Hold Controller (Y)
  • Use Held Object: K / Controller (X)
  • Use Station: L / Controller (B)
  • Return to Ship (from island): Hold L / Hold Controller (B)
